import React from"react";import BoardRow from'./BoardRow';export default function BoardTable(_ref){var boardSize=_ref.boardSize;// console.log('BoardTable()')
var table=[];for(var y=0;y<boardSize;y++){table.push(React.createElement("div",{key:y,style:{display:'flex',alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'center'}},React.createElement(BoardRow,{y:y,boardSize:boardSize})));}return table;}
